author: Graham Lawton
title: Why are men more likely to get worse symptoms and die from covid-19?
description: More men die of covid-19 than women. Reasons for this may include differences in smoking, general health, immune defences, hormones and even hygiene
content:
By Graham Lawton
A London health care worker takes a man from an ambulance.
Justin Setterfield/Getty Images
We know that older people are more vulnerable to covid-19, but another major risk factor has emerged: being male.
